# `select_polygon_info`

Select polygon info


## Description

Select polygon info


## Usage

```r
select_polygon_info(...)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`...`     |      Arguments passed on to [`get_polygon_info`](#getpolygoninfo)   list("\n", "    ", list(list(list("gobject")), list("giotto object")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("polygon_name")), list("name of polygons. Default \"cell\"")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("polygon_overlap")), list("include polygon overlap information")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("return_giottoPolygon")), list("(Defaults to FALSE) Return as giottoPolygon S4 object")), "\n", "  ")
